scripts.setup: if [ ! -d .venv ]; then python3 -m venv .venv; fi && .venv/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && .venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: find . -type d -name '__pycache__' -exec rm -r {} + 2>/dev/null || true; find . -type f -name '*.pyc' -delete 2>/dev/null || true; rm -rf .venv
